summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 24, 2019, detailing inmate counts by housing unit. It includes a specific entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who is listed as being on suicide watch or unassigned.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with the register number 78107-054, assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) and categorized under 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, documenting the population by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 24, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed with register number 78107-054 and is shown as assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital).
Epstein's assignment category is noted as 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (suicide watch or unassigned).
The total inmate count for the facility was 774, with a verification count of 773.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative record showing inmate population management.
